div:
Introduction This resource is an observation of a Consistent With. It is typically one observation of a set of related observations that comprise a finding. This and its related obsevations are all referenced by a parent 'section' observation by that parents 'Observation.hasMember' element.
Graphical Overview
This graph provides an overview of how and where Consistent With is referenced,and what items Consistent With itself references.
Member Fields The following are fields of this observation. Each field contains one data item. Each field is stored in the Observation.component element.
Value component
Qualifier component
Member Observations The following are fields of this observation that are stored in seperate observation resources. Each field referenced is stored as an item in the Observation.hasMember element.
%hasMemberList:noexpand%
